Actions.Text: HELD FOR CONSIDERATION IN RACING AND WAGERING

Title: Relates to the transfer of veterinary records for claimed racehorses
Summary: Requires veterinary records for all claimed racehorses in claiming races, must be transferred from the owner of the racehorse to the claimant within 48 hours of finalizing the claim.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to requiring transfer of all veterinary records of a claimed racehorse from the owner to the claimant within forty-eight hours from the time the claim is finalized
